Title: üé¨ After the anti-Semitic statements of the ambassador of the Isl...

Title: üé¨ The explosion in West Islamabad in Kermanshah killed at least ...
Description: An explosion in West Islamabad in Kermanshah left at least four people dead and eight injured. The governor said the cause of the explosion was a gas leak. Title: üé¨ We asked the audience of Iran International what they thought ...
Description: We asked the audience of Iran International, what do you think about the proposed ministers of medicine? Shahrvandani says: It turned out that Medeshian has the role of a scarecrow in Khamenei's cabinet and he has to dance to every instrument of leadership. We, the people, have to think about our situation. Mukhatabi also states: The doctors said on the first day that I am useless and that I am in the province. He had said that the ministers should be appointed through the leadership. Earlier, Shahram Dabiri, the parliamentary deputy of Masoud Mezikian, regarding the introduction of the cabinet members of the 14th government, wrote on X channel: - The president has clearly announced that he will appoint the members of the cabinet with the opinion of Khamenei and His approval will introduce.

Title: üé¨ The videos sent to Iran International show a group of Iranians...
Description: The videos sent to Iran International show that a group of Iranians living in Chicago held a protest rally against the issuance and execution of death sentences by the Islamic Republic on Sunday, August 21. The attendees carried photos of Mujahid Korkur and Abbas Drees, protestors who were sentenced to death.

Title: üîÅüñº üîª The closing ceremony of the 2024 Paris Olympics was held ...
Description: Forwarded From Iran International Sports The closing ceremony of the 2024 Paris Olympics was held and Thomas Bach, the head of the International Olympic Committee, took the flag of these games from the mayor of Paris and handed it to Karen Bass, the mayor of Los Angeles. He handed the flag to Simone Biles, Team USA's most decorated athlete at the Paris Olympics. Next, there was a special surprise; Tom Cruise appeared from the sky and took the Olympic flag from Biles and went into the crowd, got on a motorcycle and took the flag to Los Angeles; The 2028 Olympics will be held in LA and in the neighborhood of Hollywood. See more pictures here. @iraninltvsport
